attributes.action: Allow YouTube star OldChavvyGit to become a Government Advisor
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Labour is supposed to be for the working classes but they seem to have become champagne socialists.
OldChavvyGit has common sense and has posted some videos on YouTube which, if followed, might inspire the Government to become more in-tune with its target voters. To have a look, just type his name into YouTube's search box.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
